body_html: @sclarkson You made me jealous. I do not have a good way to have 4 Titan Vs but I ordered two for the t team so we could help ensure things are working when the community has issues. Things will slow down for the holidays but we have discussed 9.1 and the team desires to roll it out fast in Q1 as well as finish up the CUDA 9 upgrade.

body: @sclarkson   You made me jealous.  I do not have a good way to have 4 Titan Vs but I ordered two for the t team so we could help ensure things are working when the community has issues.  Things will slow down for the holidays but we have discussed 9.1 and the team desires to roll it out fast in Q1 as well as finish up the CUDA 9 upgrade.
